[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#F5F7FA" custom_padding="100px||100px||true|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="1200px" custom_padding="0px||64px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="JetBrains Mono|500|||||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="11px" text_letter_spacing="3px" text_orientation="center" header_2_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_2_text_color="#253B50" header_2_font_size="44px" header_2_line_height="1.15em" global_colors_info="{}"]

Complete Manufacturing Stack

One Ecosystem. Total Visibility.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="18px" text_line_height="1.6em" text_orientation="center" max_width="700px" module_alignment="center" global_colors_info="{}"]

From financials to the factory floor, every DigiWin product works together—no integration nightmares, no data silos.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="1200px" custom_padding="0px||0px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_blurb title="ERP Core" url="/products/erp/" image_icon_placement="top" _builder_version="4.27.0" header_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_text_color="#253B50" header_font_size="20px" body_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" body_text_color="#64748b" body_font_size="14px" body_line_height="1.6em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="40px|28px|40px|28px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="#f1f5f9" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="24px" box_shadow_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.04)" animation_style="none" global_colors_info="{}"]

Enterprise Resource Planning

The central brain of your business

• Financials — accounting, invoicing, budgets in one place

• Inventory — real-time stock levels across locations

• Operations — purchase orders, sales, and costs connected

Replace scattered spreadsheets with one source of truth.

[/et_pb_blurb] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_blurb title="MES" url="/products/mes/" image_icon_placement="top" _builder_version="4.27.0" header_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_text_color="#253B50" header_font_size="20px" body_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" body_text_color="#64748b" body_font_size="14px" body_line_height="1.6em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="40px|28px|40px|28px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="#f1f5f9" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="24px" box_shadow_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.04)" animation_style="none" global_colors_info="{}"]

Manufacturing Execution System

Your digital eyes on the production floor

• Track — follow every product through each workstation

• Record — who made what, when, and how

• Alert — spot delays and quality issues instantly

Answer “which batch was my order?” in seconds.

[/et_pb_blurb] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_blurb title="WMS" url="/products/wms/" image_icon_placement="top" _builder_version="4.27.0" header_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_text_color="#253B50" header_font_size="20px" body_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" body_text_color="#64748b" body_font_size="14px" body_line_height="1.6em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="40px|28px|40px|28px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="#f1f5f9" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="24px" box_shadow_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.04)" animation_style="none" global_colors_info="{}"]

Warehouse Management System

Never lose track of inventory again

• Locate — know which shelf, bin, and zone for every item

• Guide — barcode scanning for pick, pack, and ship

• Count — cycle counts that match reality

Faster fulfillment, fewer mistakes, accurate stock.

[/et_pb_blurb] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_blurb title="AIoT" url="/products/aiot/" image_icon_placement="top" _builder_version="4.27.0" header_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_text_color="#253B50" header_font_size="20px" body_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" body_text_color="#64748b" body_font_size="14px" body_line_height="1.6em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="40px|28px|40px|28px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="#f1f5f9" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="24px" box_shadow_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.04)" animation_style="none" global_colors_info="{}"]

AI + Internet of Things

Connect your machines to the digital world

• Collect — temperature, speed, vibration automatically

• Predict — machine breakdowns before they happen

• Optimize — energy usage and efficiency gains

No manual logging. AI finds what humans miss.

[/et_pb_blurb] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

info.name: DigiWin Homepage - Section 5: Products Grid
info.description: 4-column product showcase using DIVI Blurb modules. Each card shows product abbreviation, full name, tagline, 3 key features, and a benefit statement. Links to individual product pages.
divi_modules_used: et_pb_blurb (4 product cards with title, URL, body content)
notes: Products: ERP Core, MES, WMS, AIoT
Blurb body contains inline-styled fullname, tagline, features, and benefit line
SVG icons from HTML version are NOT included - use DIVI icon or add custom images
Each blurb links to its product page
